title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{9x^{2\left(x^2-36\right)}}{\left(x^2+11x+30\right) 3x^2}$$

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{9x^{2\left(x^2-36\right)}}{\left(x^2+11x+30\right) 3x^2}=\frac{9x^{2\left(x+6\right)} \left(x-6\right)}{\left(x+6\right) \left(x+5\right) 3x^2}=\frac{3\left(x-6\right)}{x+5}$$
